sentence: Among the underlying components of the Russell 3000 index, we saw noteworthy options trading volume today in Broadcom Ltd (Symbol: AVGO), where a total of 12,727 contracts have traded so far, representing approximately 1.3 million underlying shares.
That amounts to about 43% of AVGO's average daily trading volume over the past month of 3.0 million shares.
Particularly high volume was seen for the $180 strike call option expiring January 20, 2017 , with 4,581 contracts trading so far today, representing approximately 458,100 underlying shares of AVGO.

Below is a chart showing AVGO's trailing twelve month trading history, with the $180 strike highlighted in orange:

Eagle Pharmaceuticals, Inc. (Symbol: EGRX) saw options trading volume of 1,493 contracts, representing approximately 149,300 underlying shares or approximately 42.6% of EGRX's average daily trading volume over the past month, of 350,250 shares.
Especially high volume was seen for the $80 strike call option expiring March 17, 2017 , with 706 contracts trading so far today, representing approximately 70,600 underlying shares of EGRX.

Below is a chart showing EGRX's trailing twelve month trading history, with the $80 strike highlighted in orange:

And Home Depot Inc (Symbol: HD) saw options trading volume of 19,066 contracts, representing approximately 1.9 million underlying shares or approximately 41.7% of HD's average daily trading volume over the past month, of 4.6 million shares.
Especially high volume was seen for the $134 strike put option expiring January 20, 2017 , with 1,023 contracts trading so far today, representing approximately 102,300 underlying shares of HD.

Below is a chart showing HD's trailing twelve month trading history, with the $134 strike highlighted in orange:

For the various different available expirations for AVGO options , EGRX options , or HD options , visit StockOptionsChannel.com.
